title: Client shrinks after pressing Play
body:
After I press the Play button and the log in screen comes up, the log in screen loads up as full size then immediately shrinks down to the minimum size. I can resize it from there but it doesn't change the resolution so everything is pixelated, additionally most of the huds (the queue accept, runes and masteries, all hover text) stay at the smallest size and do not stretch with the client. This happens randomly and will sometimes not happen at all. I've been having this problem since patch 6.9. Things I've tried: running as administrator, reinstalling, repairing the installation, changing a file in the league of legends folder to resize=true, and running in compatibility mode, none worked. Thanks for any help

[Before](https://gyazo.com/a4fdad0a97a4d733fae6ef11e77e0f90)

[After](https://gyazo.com/62ac8ae7d33e08ded74d6784989b0f65)

replies.body:
This is the first time I think I have every heard of this issue before.  There is a way to force your client to appear in its standard size configuration.  If you however your mouse to the very top bar of the login screen or the main page of the client (to the immediate right of where it says "League of Legends 6.10.16_05_13_13_53") and double-click, your client should automatically resize.

Let me know if this helps and works!

I tried it and it didn't resize the client it just moved it from the upper left of the screen to the middle :/

[before](https://gyazo.com/f698c2a7881ff9cdf3cb1afe0c069611)
[after](https://gyazo.com/6fedbfa05bbe4fb2ea5c9dc8d671596e)

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Hmmm...even when using the double-click option in the client itself, does everything remain pixelated when you try to enlarge it manually?

If so, we may need to start digging a little deeper to figure out why this is occurring.  To that end, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  Just make sure to include the following:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
